name: TREADZONE
description:
Treadzone - a prototype tank game where i tried to make, my own AI tanks. This game doesn't have an end yet, after you kill every tank around there's nothing left to do, but you can always restart with R!

It’s just a prototype i’m working on so if you do find bugs other than getting stuck in the walls, send me a bug report on contact.gearshockgames@gmail.com!

Used music: Bit by Bit sound - Anxious, from sample 8-bit music album!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aiming

LMB - Primary fire

RMB - Drop a mine

Shift - switch camera modes

1 - switch weapon to ricochet cannon

3 - switch weapon to iron piercer

9 - switch weapon to assbeater420
